Key Match Events: Joachim Andersen shanked the ball into his own net, but the assistant referee flagged for an offside against Tadic in the build-up.
Pre-Game Insights: Dragan Stojkovic, the Serbia coach, surprisingly dropped Filip Mladenovic, Dusan Vlahovic, and Dusan Tadic.
Post-Match Reflections: Novak Djokovic, who had belted out the Serbian anthem, looked on.
A Uefa fine will inevitably arrive for the Serbian fans' behavior.
The Serbia coach said it is not his business to talk about the fan behavior issues.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was postponed by one minute.
The atmosphere was flat, reflecting the lack of cohesion in the game.
Others: The match was played in a stiflingly hot environment in Bavaria.
The Danish coach, Kasper Hjulmand, expressed optimism about facing Germany in the next round.
